headline.main: SPANKING ADVOCATED TO FIGHT PROPAGANDA; Walsh Urges 'Old-Fashioned' Teaching of Morality

lead_paragraph: Parents were advised yesterday by Thomas J. Walsh, national commander of the Catholic War Veterans, to return to the old-fashioned method of spanking and the teaching of old-fashioned morality lessons to save their children from the temptations of modern-day subversive propaganda.
